Overview For gstBT_Stack Members Chapter

gstBT_Stack

gstBT_Stack( int depth = 50 ) ;

Ctor. Initializes and allocates memory for stack.

~gstBT_Stack

~gstBT_Stack( ) ;

Dtor. Deletes objects in stack and deletes stack itself.

empty

int empty( ) ;

Is the stack empty?

init

void init( ) ;

Initialize the stack by emptying it.

pop

gstBT_Node* pop( double& min , double& max ) ;

Pop top node off of stack, returning node and bounds.

push

void push( gstBT_Node* node , double min , double max ) ;

Push a new node and bounds onto the stack.
